CodeList.Name: Cardiovascular Findings About Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe findings about a cardiovascular event or intervention.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Categorization of the type of acute myocardial infarction.
The method by which the coronary artery thrombosis event is determined or diagnosed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Coronary Artery Thrombosis Method of Identification

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication as to whether the event meets the criteria for being a clinical endpoint.
Categorization of the type of healthcare encounter.
Categorization of the type(s) of new and/or worsening laboratory findings of heart failure present at the time of patient presentation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Lab Findings of New or Worsening Heart Failure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Categorization of the type(s) of new and/or worsening physical exam findings of heart failure present at the time of patient presentation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Physical Examination Findings of New or Worsening Heart Failure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Categorization of the type(s) of new and/or intensified treatment administered for heart failure management.
An indicator as to whether the subject has symptoms of ischemic discomfort.
Categorization of the type of objective evidence of new or worsening ischemia.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Exclusion of Type 1 and Type 2 MI
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication of whether a Type 1 and Type 2 myocardial infarction is excluded as a diagnosis.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Exclusion of Type 1 and Type 2 Myocardial Infarction Diagnosis Indicator

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A description of the clinical change to the subject after a non-invasive imaging procedure.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Clinical Change by Non-Invasive Imaging Procedure

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A description of the new or worsening symptoms related to a clinical event.
Categorization of the type of acute PCI angiographic complication resulting in acute myocardial ischemia.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Acute Myocardial Infarction From PCI Complication Type

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An indication as to whether the procedure is considered successful.
The degree of urgency in which a medical procedure must be performed.
Categorization of the timing of coronary stent thrombosis occurrence per the classification schema described by the Academic Research Consortium (ARC).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Academic Research Council Coronary Stent Thrombosis Timing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Categorization of the type of stroke.
An indication as to whether the subject had symptoms related to the clinical event.
The date time of the onset of symptoms of the clinical event.
An indication as to whether vessel occlusion, in the native or bypass graft, occurred within 48 hours after the coronary artery bypass graft procedure.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Vessel Occlusion 48 Hours after CABG Indicator

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Cardiovascular Findings About Test Code Terminology
